name: Roll Them Bones (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
description:
Roll Them Bones - An action game with dicey odds!

Try to get the most points within five minutes as you battle through three spooky stages!

Dice rolls determine your stats - no two playthroughs are the same! And rumor has it there are some special dice out there that could even the odds...

Music attribution

He Plays Me The Best Rhythms
